short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate links containing messages that can only be viewed once.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you need to securely send messages to people, give Poof Links a try.

Send messages that self-destruct immediately after being viewed and expire if left unviewed for 30 minutes. All submitted messages are secured on our servers with military-grade AES-256 encryption.
